name: paella-player
description: PaellaPlayer is a set of libraries to create a multi stream video player. This is the central repository that groups all Paella Player packages, which is divided into several libraries:

scripts.dev: npm run -w repos/paella-core dev & npm run -w repos/paella-basic-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-slide-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-user-tracking dev & npm run -w repos/paella-video-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-webgl-plugins dev & npm run -w repos/paella-zoom-plugin dev & npm run -w samples/development-player dev
